DOC.brief_summary: This study design investigate safety tolerability PTH134 healthy subject assess exposure PTH134 .
DOC.brief_title: Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetic Pharmacodynamic Effect PTH134 Increasing Doses Healthy Postmenopausal Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy postmenopausal female subject , 40 70 year age good health determine past medical history , physical examination , vital sign , electrocardiogram , laboratory test screen Body mass index ( BMI ) within range 19 32 . Smokers report cigarette use > = 5 cigarette per day . Use prescription drug overthecounter ( OTC ) medication ( vitamin , herbal supplement , dietary supplement ) start within last month prior screen . Previous osteoporosis treatment History drug alcohol abuse within 12 month prior dose evidence abuse Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
